name: Dino VR Shooter
description:
Compatible with Cardboard, Lakento, VR-PRIMUS and any other VR headset with built-in control.

Compatible with MFi Bluetooth controller

Discover 5 different areas of a misterious island full of Dinosaurs and other prehistoric creatures.

Get 5 different guns that will help to save your life.


TECHNICAL:

FULL 60 fps immersive performance
